text: Betssy Betzabet Chávez Chino (born 3 June 1989) is a Peruvian lawyer and politician. In November 2022, she became the Prime Minister of Peru, replacing Aníbal Torres. She has been a member of the Peruvian Congress since July 2021. She was the Minister of Culture from August 2022 to November 2022. She was also the Minister of Labor and Employment Promotion from October 2021 until May 2022. ==References== Category:1989 births Category:Living people Category:Prime ministers of Peru
title: Betssy Chávez
